title: Best Tips for Getting Free Shipping & Discount Codes on Shein

steps.title: Spend at least $29 to get free standard shipping.
steps.content: Spend at least $29 to get free standard shipping. Any order over $29 automatically qualifies for free shipping, and orders over $129 automatically qualify for free express shipping. This is probably the easiest way to get free shipping on Shein if your budget allows for it. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Create a new account.
steps.content: Create a new account. Shein typically offers free shipping to new customers for their first purchase. Sign up with an email address that isn’t already associated with a Shein account to qualify. Depending on the deals Shein has at the time of sign-up, you may have to spend a certain amount to get free shipping. This amount should be listed alongside the coupon code.

steps.title: Subscribe to Shein’s newsletter.
steps.content: Subscribe to Shein’s newsletter. When you create a Shein account, it gives you the option to opt into their promotional newsletter, which will email you any news and offers related to Shein. Sometimes, the newsletter includes coupons for free shipping or other promotions that aren’t available otherwise. Make sure to read these newsletters carefully before deleting them! [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sign up for Shein’s free trial program.
steps.content: Sign up for Shein’s free trial program. Shein has a free trial center that allows users to try new items at no cost to them. Simply find the item you want, click “Free Trial,” and fill out the required information. If you’re approved, Shein will send you the item in exchange for a review. This is a great way to get free shipping and a free product! [3] X Research source While all Shein members 18 years or older are eligible to apply for a free trial , only a select few get accepted. Shein allows you to apply up to 3 times a week. Another way to get free clothes from Shein is to enter giveaways on Shein’s social media.

steps.title: Check the app frequently around holidays or sales events.
steps.content: Check the app frequently around holidays or sales events. Shein often offers free shipping or other discounts around big shopping holidays, like Black Friday. Be sure to read any promotional emails from Shein around these events and log into your account on the day of and the days leading up to the event to see if there are any promotions available. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Attend Live Wednesday broadcasts.
steps.content: Attend Live Wednesday broadcasts. Every Wednesday afternoon or evening, Shein and its collaborators host a live broadcast in which they discuss trends and news regarding Shein. During these meetings, they often give out promotions like codes for free shipping. These codes typically expire at midnight, and the minimum purchase amount varies from code to code. [5] X Research source To view the live broadcast, log into your Shein app and click on the “Live” icon on the homepage.

steps.title: Play Shein games.
steps.content: Play Shein games. Occasionally, Shein has different promotional games (like spinning a wheel or matching images) that offer discounts or free shipping for winners. These games are typically available around holidays like Valentine’s Day and Mother’s Day, though they may appear sporadically throughout the year. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Split the cost with friends.
steps.content: Split the cost with friends. If your order doesn’t qualify for free shipping and there are no coupons available, try combining your order with a friend’s so you reach the free shipping minimum. This way, you’ll each pay for your own items without having to spend extra money on shipping fees. For example, if you and your friend each wanted an item that was $15, purchase both items in a single order so you spend $30 and reach the minimum for free standard shipping. Then, just have your friend pay you their portion of the total cost.

steps.title: Find coupon codes on Shein’s app or website.
steps.content: Find coupon codes on Shein’s app or website. Shein almost always offers some kind of discount or promotion for customers, and these are typically presented as soon as you log into your account. Check in frequently to see when free shipping codes are offered. [7] X Research source As mentioned above, it’s also a good idea to read Shein’s newsletters to see if they’re offering any additional promotions.

steps.title: Apply third-party coupons found online.
steps.content: Apply third-party coupons found online. Sometimes, Shein accepts coupon codes that aren’t specifically listed on their site. Try searching a phrase like “Shein coupons free shipping” online to find websites that offer discount codes. While some of these coupons will be fake, it is possible to find real ones if you have patience. Remember, coupons do not require you to give out any personal information. All you have to do is copy and paste the code and apply it to your shopping cart.

steps.title: Shein sometimes offers free shipping on Sunday if you spend over $9.
steps.content: Shein sometimes offers free shipping on Sunday if you spend over $9. In the past, Shein offered free shipping with no minimum purchase at a random time on Sundays. However, the company has recently changed the promotion so users can only get free shipping if they spend more than $9. Whether or not this promotion is available seems to vary from country to country.

steps.title: Shein only allows customers to use one discount code per order.
steps.content: Shein only allows customers to use one discount code per order. Unfortunately, according to Shein’s coupon policy , you cannot stack coupons. This means if you have a coupon for 20% off your order and a coupon for free shipping, for example, you can only apply one per order. Try applying each before checking out to see which coupon will save you the most money. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Shein’s standard shipping costs $3.99 in the United States.
steps.content: Shein’s standard shipping costs $3.99 in the United States. Express shipping costs $12.90. These rates are subject to change per Shein’s discretion, and shipping rates differ depending on which country you live in. Visit Shein’s website for your country to determine current shipping prices. [9] X Research source
